categories: Category:Admirals and generals of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sevik was a male admiral in the Imperial Navy of the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. He participated in a high-stakes pazaak tournament and sought a "competitive edge" from the underworld, and the trick pazaak deck he acquired from an underworld figure helped him win the tournament, leading him to reward the individual a portion of his winnings.
